xMatixPlatform.title: Partner-Led Distribution
xMatixPlatform.description1: Partner-led distribution breaks when sales, inventory, fulfilment, and incentives are managed across disconnected systems and organisations. Limited visibility and delayed data lead to lost sales, inventory imbalances, and inconsistent partner execution. xMatix enables end-to-end partner-led distribution on a single operational foundation, connecting partners directly into governed, real-time execution workflows.

ecosystemSection.title: The Problem
ecosystemSection.description: Most partner ecosystems operate with fragmented tools and delayed reporting. While partners handle sales and fulfilment, enterprises lack real-time control over inventory, pricing, incentives, and execution quality, resulting in inefficiencies and revenue leakage.

ecosystem.title: Partner Portals & CRM
ecosystem.description: Capture partner orders and leads but operate independently from inventory availability, fulfilment status, and financial controls.

ecosystem.title: Inventory & Supply Chain Systems
ecosystem.description: Manage stock centrally without real-time visibility into partner-held inventory or sell-through activity.

ecosystem.title: Incentives & Rebates Tools
ecosystem.description: Calculate partner incentives after transactions occur, creating disputes and delayed payouts.

ecosystem.title: Reporting & Analytics
ecosystem.description: Provide lagging indicators on partner performance but cannot intervene during live distribution execution.

whatIsIt.title: How xMatix Helps
whatIsIt.description2: xMatix acts as the execution layer for partner-led distribution, unifying partner orders, inventory visibility, fulfilment, and incentives into a single continuous workflow. Built on the xMatix Platform, Data Fabric, and Sense, it connects partners directly into governed execution while maintaining enterprise control, policy enforcement, and real-time visibility.

cardLayoutData.title: How {{highlight}}partner-led distribution{{/highlight}} works on xMatix
cardLayoutData.description: Partner-led distribution runs on a shared execution layer, ensuring alignment between partners and the enterprise from order creation to settlement.

features.title: Partner Order Capture
features.description: Enable partners to create and manage orders within governed workflows, with real-time pricing, availability, and policy validation.

features.title: Inventory Visibility & Allocation
features.description: Provide real-time visibility into central and partner-held inventory, while enforcing allocation and replenishment rules.

features.title: Fulfilment & Sell-Through
features.description: Track fulfilment and sell-through activity across partner locations, ensuring accurate execution and timely replenishment.

features.title: Incentives & Settlement
features.description: Apply incentive rules during execution, automate accruals, and settle partner payouts with full transparency and traceability.

requestADemo.heading: See partner-led distribution executed on xMatix
requestADemo.description: Request a demo to see how xMatix brings partners, inventory, fulfilment, and incentives together on a single execution platform.
